overview: The film centers on a Spanish tapas bar and the love lives of the loosely interconnected people in the neighborhood surrounding the bar. The pairs of lovers include a middle aged woman and a young man; an elderly, drug dealing woman and her terminally ill husband in poor health; the tapas bar owner and his estranged wife; and two Chinese immigrants.
tagline: The small, everyday stories of a group of neighbours who live in a suburb of Barcelona, and the little secrets that they hide.
title: Tapas
